annotations.description: Here’s how to make the Aku-Aku Zombie, a remix of a tiki classic. Just like the original 1934 recipe, this 1964 recipe comes from Don the Beachcomber and is ...
annotations.title: Aku Aku Zombie (1964 Recipe) - How to Make the Tiki Drink & the History Behind It

textContent:
0.75 oz (22 ml) Cuban (or Puerto Rican) Gold Rum
0.75 oz (22 ml) Jamaican Dark Rum
0.75 oz (22 ml) 151 Demerara Rum
0.75 oz (22 ml) lime juice
0.75 oz (22 ml) grapefruit juice (preferably white)
0.75 oz (22 ml) cinnamon syrup
0.5 tsp (2.5 ml) Zombie Mix
1 dash aromatic bitters
garnish mint sprigs

Add crushed ice to tiki mug
Zombie mix is equal parts curacao, absinthe, falernum, and grenadine
Shake ingredients with crushed ice and open pour into mug
Garnish with mint and add a straw

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YWDCg-hfOVA
title: Aku Aku Zombie
